TopicTitle: YCG Viewer input request: What kind of stuff would you like me to make?

Articles.Content:
Hello, this is YCG Gaming (known as It'snorocketscience on the forums) here, I posted this thread to ask you for your opinion on things, after all, YCG stands for You Choose Gaming!

Just post suggestions if you have seen my channel and/or individual videos, suggestions can be about anything, as long as nobody else has arguably suggested the same thing.

All your posts will be read, just like your comments, and all of those needing and/or requesting a response will have a response.

Also, I've created a quick poll above to ask you about something.

Other channel news:

-Straw Poll (Vote in a poll to vote for a new series of your choice!):

-New Twitter Account: http://strawpoll.me/2120777/r

-Latest Video: YCG channel announcement @:

Thanks
